Package construct

Class Tower

java.lang.Object
construct.Tower
Direct Known Subclasses:
Bacon, Core, Egg, Farm, Milk, Reactor, Shield, Thruster
public abstract class Tower extends Object
Super class for buildable towers
Author:
Eddie Ouyang
